actions.committee: House Committee on International Relations (Subsequently: Foreign Affairs)
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations (Subsequently: Foreign Affairs).

official_title: A concurrent resolution with respect to the freedom of the Republic of China and its people.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the United States do nothing to compromise the freedom of the Republic of China while engaged in a lessening of tensions with the People's Republic of China.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution with respect to the freedom of the Republic of China and its people.
